why.title: Why use KinCode?
why.riskText: Today, with artificial intelligence, it is easy to clone a voice or face. Scammers can call pretending to be a child or grandparent in distress to ask for money.
why.solutionText: If you have any doubt during a call, ask: "What is the code?". Only your real relative, who scanned this QR code, can give you the 6 digits displayed on their phone.

help.title: How does it work?
help.step0Text: You must be physically together to use KinCode. The secret code cannot be securely transmitted remotely.
help.step1Text: Enter the names of the people and click "Generate". A unique secret code will be created.
help.step2Text: Each person scans their QR code with an app like Google Authenticator, Authy, or 2FAS.
help.step3Text: When you need to verify your identity, compare your 6-digit codes. If they match, it's really you!
help.whyText: The code changes every 30 seconds and cannot be guessed. Only people who scanned the QR code can generate the correct code at the right time.

help.privacyText: No data is sent over the internet. Everything happens in your browser. Once the page is closed, the secret code only exists in your apps.
